TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogExtent extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表包含記錄檔資料的延伸磁碟區。

span.span: Represents a disk extent that contains log data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體會將它的資料儲存在 執行個體所代表的延伸磁碟區集合中。A instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by instances. 特定 只會與一個 相關聯，而且在同一個 中的 物件的大小都相同。A particular is associated with exactly one , and objects in the same are of identical size. 在 執行個體中新增及移除空間時，將會以延伸區的倍數來進行。Space is added to and removed from a instance in extent increments. 雖然 物件會在磁碟上以檔案形式表示，但是您不可以將它們當做一般的檔案來移動或刪除。Although objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files. 若要刪除 執行個體，請從它所在的 中進行移除。To delete a instance, remove it from the that contains it. ## Examples 這個範例將示範如何使用 類別，在記錄順序中新增及模擬延伸區。This example shows how to use the class to add and emulate extents in a log sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然 物件會在磁碟上以檔案形式表示，但是您不可以將它們當做一般的檔案來移動或刪除。Although objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files. 若要刪除 執行個體，請從它所在的 中進行移除。To delete a instance, remove it from the that contains it. ## Examples 這個範例將示範如何使用 類別，在記錄順序中新增及模擬延伸區。This example shows how to use the class to add and emulate extents in a log sequence.
